meanings.definition: Relating to the study of bird eggs.
meanings.sent1: Her oological research focused on the colors and patterns of bird eggs.
meanings.sent2: The scientist's oological work involved observing different types of bird eggs.
meanings.sent3: The oological enthusiast had a collection of beautifully colored bird eggs.
meanings.sent4: His oological expertise allowed him to identify bird species based on their eggs.
meanings.sent5: The oological field trip was both educational and exciting for the students.

meanings.definition: The branch of ornithology that deals with the study of bird eggs.
meanings.sent1: Learning about oological helped her understand the diversity of bird species.
meanings.sent2: The professor's passion for oological inspired many students to pursue bird egg studies.
meanings.sent3: The oological conference brought together experts from around the world to discuss bird eggs.
meanings.sent4: In the world of oological, each bird egg tells a unique story about its species.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the beauty and complexity of oological research.
